<a id="EditorSelection"></a>

# EditorSelection

**Inherits:** [Object](Object.md)

Manages the SceneTree selection in the editor.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

This object manages the SceneTree selection in the editor.

\ **Note:** This class shouldn't be instantiated directly. Instead, access the singleton using [EditorInterface.get_selection()](EditorInterface.md#EditorInterface_method_get_selection).

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="EditorSelection_method_add_node"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **add_node**\ (\ node\: [Node](Node.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#EditorSelection_method_add_node)

Adds a node to the selection.

\ **Note:** The newly selected node will not be automatically edited in the inspector. If you want to edit a node, use [EditorInterface.edit_node()](EditorInterface.md#EditorInterface_method_edit_node).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorSelection_method_clear"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **clear**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#EditorSelection_method_clear)

Clear the selection.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorSelection_method_get_selected_nodes"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Array](Array.md)\[[Node](Node.md)\] **get_selected_nodes**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#EditorSelection_method_get_selected_nodes)

Returns the list of selected nodes.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorSelection_method_get_top_selected_nodes"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Array](Array.md)\[[Node](Node.md)\] **get_top_selected_nodes**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#EditorSelection_method_get_top_selected_nodes)

Returns the list of top selected nodes only, excluding any children. This is useful for performing transform operations (moving them, rotating, etc.).

For example, if there is a node A with a child B and a sibling C, then selecting all three will cause this method to return only A and C. Changing the global transform of A will affect the global transform of B, so there is no need to change B separately.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorSelection_method_get_transformable_selected_nodes"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Array](Array.md)\[[Node](Node.md)\] **get_transformable_selected_nodes**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#EditorSelection_method_get_transformable_selected_nodes)

**Deprecated:** Use [get_top_selected_nodes()](EditorSelection.md#EditorSelection_method_get_top_selected_nodes) instead.

Returns the list of top selected nodes only, excluding any children. This is useful for performing transform operations (moving them, rotating, etc.). See [get_top_selected_nodes()](EditorSelection.md#EditorSelection_method_get_top_selected_nodes).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorSelection_method_remove_node"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **remove_node**\ (\ node\: [Node](Node.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#EditorSelection_method_remove_node)

Removes a node from the selection.
